pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Coding Assistant using the Fast AI Inference 'Groq' // A comprehensive suite of functions and 'RStudio' Add-ins leveraging the capabilities of open-source Large Language Models (LLMs) to support R developers. These functions offer a range of utilities, including text rewriting, translation, and general query capabilities. Additionally, the programming- focused functions provide assistance with debugging, translating, commenting, documenting, and unit testing code, as well as suggesting variable and function names, thereby streamlining the development process.
